translations: 闺房；女人的会客室或化妆室

sentences.sentence: But who will be the master of my boudoir then?
sentences.translation: 但谁将是这个闺房的新主人呢？

sentences.sentence: In my boudoir I sigh over the close of spring.
sentences.translation: 我在闺房中叹息着春天的结束。

sentences.sentence: Next year peach and plum trees will be in bloom again, But who will be the master of my boudoir then?
sentences.translation: 桃李明年能再发，明岁闺中知是谁？
